text.section:
The Committee consists of seven members appointed by the Board as follows:
Three respiratory care practitioners;
Three physicians:
One of whom is a specialist in thoracic surgery;
One of whom is a specialist in pulmonary medicine; and
One of whom is a specialist in anesthesiology; and
One consumer member.

section.section: The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of members are staggered.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: From among its members, the Committee shall elect a chair once every 2 years.
